targets.rawSql:
SELECT top 1
  
  vPerf.MaxValue
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'System Up Time'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 Order by datetime desc

SELECT top 1
vPerf.MaxValue as value
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like 'Memory')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'PercentMemoryUsed'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
order by vPerf.Datetime desc

SELECT top 1
vPerf.MaxValue as value
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like '% Processor Time'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
order by vPerf.Datetime desc

SELECT top 1
vPerf.MaxValue as value
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'PercentBandwidthUsedTotal'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
order by vPerf.Datetime desc

SELECT top 1
vPerf.MaxValue as value
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like '% Free Space'
 AND vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName like 'C:'
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
order by vPerf.Datetime desc

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime,  
 vPerf.SampleCount,   
 vPerf.AverageValue,  
 vPerf.MinValue,  
 vPerf.MaxValue,  
 vPerf.StandardDeviation,   
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName,   
 vManagedEntity.Path,   
 vPerformanceRule.ObjectName,   
  vPerformanceRule.CounterName  
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'  
 and vPerf.DateTime > getdate()
 order by [DateTime] desc

SELECT TOP 20 
  TimeRaised
  ,AlertStringName
  ,TicketId
  
  ,Category
  ,Owner
  ,CustomField1 as [Ticket Status]
  ,CustomField5 as [Assigned Group]
  ,CustomField6 as [Impact]
  ,CustomField6 as [Urgency]
FROM Alertview WITH (NOLOCK) 
WHERE Timeraised is not NULL and ResolutionState < 256 and (MonitoringObjectName like '%[[Server]]%' or MonitoringObjectPath like '%[[Server]]%')
ORDER BY [TimeRaised] desc

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRule.ObjectName as label,
  vPerf.MaxValue
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'Processor Queue Length'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
 Order by datetime

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRule.ObjectName as label,
  vPerf.MaxValue
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like '% Processor Time'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
 Order by datetime

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName as [NIC],
 vPerf.MaxValue as [Used %]
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like 'Memory')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'PercentMemoryUsed'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
order by vPerf.Datetime

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName as [Counter],
 vPerf.MaxValue
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like 'Memory')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like '%Bytes'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
order by vPerf.Datetime

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName as [NIC],
 vPerf.MaxValue as value
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like 'Network%')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'Bytes Total/sec'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
order by vPerf.Datetime

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName as [NIC],
 vPerf.MaxValue as value
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like 'Network Adapter')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'PercentBandwidthUsedTotal'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
order by vPerf.Datetime

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName as [Drive Letter],
 vPerf.MaxValue as value
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf 
 INNER JOIN OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId 
 INNER JOIN OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId 
 INNER JOIN OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like '%disk%')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'Free Megabytes'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
order by vPerf.Datetime

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName as label,
  vPerf.MaxValue
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like '%disk%')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like '% Idle Time'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
 Order by datetime

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName as [Drive Letter],
 vPerf.MaxValue as value
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like '%disk%')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'Avg. Disk sec/Transfer'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
order by vPerf.Datetime

SELECT   
 vPerf.DateTime as time,
 vPerformanceRuleInstance.InstanceName as [Drive Letter],
 vPerf.MaxValue as value
 FROM OperationsManagerDW.Perf.vPerfHourly AS vPerf INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId = vPerf.PerformanceRuleInstanceRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity ON vPerf.ManagedEntityRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vManagedEntity.ManagedEntityRowId INNER JOIN  
  OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule ON OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRuleInstance.RuleRowId = OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.RuleRowId   
 WHERE   
 (OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.ObjectName like '%disk%')  
 AND OperationsManagerDW.dbo.vPerformanceRule.CounterName like 'Current Disk Queue Length'  
 AND vManagedEntity.Path like '[[Server]]'
 and $__timeFilter(vPerf.Datetime)
order by vPerf.Datetime

panels.description: Up/Down state of servers monitored by SCOM

targets.rawSql:
SELECT [HealthState]
  FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[StateView] as SV
  inner join [OperationsManager].[dbo].[BaseManagedEntity] as Entity on Entity.BaseManagedEntityId = SV.[BaseManagedEntityId]
  where [MonitorName] = 'Microsoft.Windows.Server.Computer.OSAvailabilityRollup' and Entity.[DisplayName] = [[MonitoredServer]]

panels.title: [[MonitoredServer]]

list.name: Server
list.query: Select Path FROM [OperationsManagerDW].[dbo].[vManagedEntity]   where Path is not null    and FullName like '%OperatingSystem%'

list.definition:
SELECT [Path]
  FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[BaseManagedEntity]
  where [FullName] like 'Microsoft.SystemCenter.HealthService%' and [Path] not like 'Microsoft%'
  order by [Path]
list.name: MonitoredServer
list.query:
SELECT [Path]
  FROM [OperationsManager].[dbo].[BaseManagedEntity]
  where [FullName] like 'Microsoft.SystemCenter.HealthService%' and [Path] not like 'Microsoft%'
  order by [Path]

title: System Center Operations Manager - Server Performance
